Html: Rawr used to always tell me when it started up whether there was a new version available. But when I started it up today using v. 4.1.05.1, I didn't get any message. I knew there had to be something new, so I checked the website, and sure enough: v. 4.2.0. Was this feature disabled for some reason?
Wasn't disabled, but there was a bug in one of the previous versions. I think the current one should detect new releases without problems.
